typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{MeterPoint Code} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{Plant Code} as string,
		{Date/Time} as string,
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Data Value} as string,
		Units as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
Select1 derive({Date/Time} = toDate({Date/Time}, 'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> TestDate
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{MeterPoint Code},
		{Date/Time},
		{Data Type},
		{Data Value}
	)) ~> Select1
TestDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'dd/MM/yyyy') ~> sink1
